data_table.description: Form 90 - Functional Status -- grip strength; chair stand; 6 meter timed walk. This form was not required for OS participants, but was included for OS if available.

variable.name: F90VY
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: GRIPSIDE
variable.value: Not attempted for safety or health

variable.name: GRIPDOM
variable.comment: Grip strength: Dominance of hand used

variable.name: CHRSTAND
variable.value: Test completed, arises without using arm
Attempted, unable to rise from chair
Not attempted for safety or health

variable.name: CHRSTND1
variable.description: Number of stands from first chair stand
variable.comment: Single chair stand: Repeated chair stands in 15 seconds (first) Sub-question of F90 V1 Q6 'Single chair stand' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: CHRSTND2
variable.description: Number of stands from 2nd chair stand
variable.comment: Single chair stand: Repeated chair stands in 15 seconds (second) Sub-question of F90 V1 Q6 'Single chair stand' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: TIMEDWLK
variable.value: Attempted, unable to complete one trial
Not attempted for safety or health

variable.name: TIMEWLK1
variable.comment:
Timed walk: Time in seconds (first) Sub-question of F90 V1 Q7 'Timed walk' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Consider setting values less than 2 seconds to missing.

variable.name: TIMEWLK2
variable.comment:
Timed walk: Time in seconds (second) Sub-question of F90 V1 Q7 'Timed walk' (skip pattern rule not applied).
Consider setting values less than 2 seconds to missing.

variable.name: ASSTDWLK
variable.description: Used assistive device for timed walk
variable.comment: Timed walk: Assistive device used? Sub-question of F90 V1 Q7 'Timed walk' (skip pattern rule not applied).
